scripts.release:major: changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version major -m 'deploy: v%s' && npm run git:push:tags
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version minor -m 'deploy: v%s' && npm run git:push:tags
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version patch -m 'deploy: v%s' && npm run git:push:tags
scripts.git:push:tags: git push origin && git push origin --tags
